tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE camera_footage (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
    footage_url TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE surveillance_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  camera_id INT,
  automation_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE synchronization_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  automation_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE camera_lighting_mapping (
    mapping_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_id VARCHAR(100),
    automation_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (camera_id) REFERENCES security_camera_footage(camera_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    FOREIGN KEY (automation_id) REFERENCES lighting_automation(automation_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);
